cause.description:
This is to support the funding for the research into the North Atlantic Right Whale!!! Every year only one North Atlantic Right Whale is born and approx. 4 die. If this keeps up then there will be no Right Whales swimming our oceans soon!!!!
PLEASE HELP!!!!!
1. Must save the Whales
cause.mission: save the Whales and to help there habitat so that our grandkids have a chance to look at this whale!!!!!
cause.name: Save the North Atlantic Right Whale
